description:
Mom`s favorite willow tree was covered with caterpillars which she abors; Bunji is not always well behaved, so the discipline Gods scold Mom and urge her to improve in this area; Fumi suddenly wants a backpack so grandma makes her one but she doesn’t like it; Seeing the beautiful sunset, Mom and the kids take a stroll when Mom asks them what they want to be when they grow up.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Impossible after all! / Juice came out / Backpack / Dream
しるがでた / やっぱり, ムリ! / ランドセル / ゆめ
